title: Sudan’s warring sides agree to first step in cease-fire push, U.S. says
description: Talks could resume as soon as Friday, officials said.

title: George Santos confesses to theft in Brazil to avoid prosecution
description: A day earlier, the New York congressman pleaded not guilty to wide-ranging charges brought by federal prosecutors in New York.

title: What is Palestinian Islamic Jihad, the militant group Israel is targeting in Gaza?
description: Stakes are high as a new phase of the Israeli-Palestinian crisis unfolds, with Islamic Jihad emerging as an influential force in Gaza and the West Bank.

title: Ukraine achieving some success in besieged Bakhmut, Russia says
description: Russian and Ukrainian forces engaged in heavy fighting in the eastern city, officials of both countries said, but accounts differed on whether it was the start of Kyiv’s much-anticipated spring counteroffensive.

title: South Africa loaded weapons onto Russian vessel, U.S. envoy says
description: The ambassador said weapons and ammunition were loaded onto the ship, the Lady R, which docked at the Simon's Town naval base outside Cape Town, in December.

title: Ukraine’s cultural counteroffensive: The rush to erase Russia’s imprint
description: In one of the most profound examples of how President Vladimir Putin’s invasion has backfired, Ukrainians are now trying to erase Russia from their landscape.

title: U.S. sees record migration influx as pandemic border restrictions lift
description: The Title 42 border policy used during the pandemic to quickly expel migrants who were in the U.S. illegally is set to expire May 11 at 11:59 p.m.

title: Cyclone Mocha forming in the Bay of Bengal, with a disastrous landfall likely
description: The storm should become equivalent to a major hurricane, and maybe stronger than that, given favorable conditions for rapid intensification.

title: The Israeli-Palestinian conflict: A chronology
description: The recent flare-up of violence between Israel and militants in the Gaza Strip has brought new attention to an old problem.

title: War destroyed his city. He stayed to paint over the destruction.
description: Kharkiv-based street artist Gamlet Zinkivskyi is using his paintings to support Ukraine's war effort and remake the landscape of his hometown.

title: In photos: The scene at the U.S.-Mexico border as Title 42 ends
description: Migrants rushed across the border hours before pandemic-related asylum restrictions were to expire Thursday, fearing that new policies would make it far more difficult to gain entry into the United States.

title: I was not Meghan in disguise at coronation, says 79-year-old composer
description: Meghan was not at King Charles III's coronation - but many on Twitter felt convinced she was there in disguise, wearing a wig, fake mustache and large glasses.

title: A Swiss mountain could collapse. This village lies in its path.
description: The mountain towering above the tiny Swiss village of Brienz is on the verge of falling, officials fear. They've given residents until Friday to evacuate.

title: Pakistani court declares Imran Khan arrest unlawful, party leaders say
description: It was not clear if and when Khan would be released and the court did not immediately confirm that a release order was being prepared.

title: War and disaster have internally displaced 71 million people, report says
description: The Ukraine war and floods in Pakistan helped trigger displacement "on a scale never seen before," the Norwegian Refugee Council said.

title: Suspect in Natalee Holloway disappearance to be extradited in U.S. fraud case
description: Joran van der Sloot is accused of extorting Beth Holloway, the teen’s mother, for the body’s location. He is in a Peruvian prison for murdering a different woman.

title: Israel strikes in Gaza for third day, killing militant commander
description: Overnight negotiations for a cease-fire appear to have collapsed as Israeli forces target more members of the Islamic Jihad leadership with 25 Palestinians killed so far.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Battle for Bakhmut intensifies as Ukrainian officials claim crucial advance
description: Officials said Ukraine reclaimed more than a mile of territory near Bakhmut, after months of pitched battles for control of the besieged city.

title: Italy calls crisis meeting as pasta prices jump almost 20 percent
description: As Italy’s government meets to discuss the cause of the pasta price jump, one social media user said, “I can gnocchi believe the prices, I’d re-fusilli to pay.”

title: U.S. response remains muted a year after slaying of reporter in West Bank
description: In the year since Shireen Abu Akleh was killed with apparent impunity, her family has demanded an independent investigation. They are still waiting for justice.

title: South Korea will be vulnerable to North’s drones for years, leak warns
description: THE DISCORD LEAKS | An incursion late last year exposed extensive weaknesses and shortcomings in South Korea’s air defense, U.S. intelligence indicates.
